dao.name: SEL_USE_TYP
dao.statement: select trim(use_typ) as value, use_nam as display, use_eng from bquse_rf order by use_typ

dao.name: DEF_INTER_COD
dao.statement: Select inter_cod from bquse_rf where trim(use_typ) = trim(:use_typ)

dao.name: CHK_USE_TYP
dao.statement: Select inter_cod from bquse_rf where trim(use_typ) = trim(:use_typ)
